title: EMS Chat on 4th March 2026
body:
*EMS Chat 4 March 2026*
*Location: 4th SCDF Division, Theatrette, Level 2.*
*Time:* 0900hrs - 1300hrs

Good afternoon ECs, the attached link is for 4th Div EMS personnel to book their slots for the upcoming EMS CHAT.

*Attire:* Working attire (SCDF polo tee & No.3 pants). 

- Personnel who fail to adhere to appropriate attire standards will be denied access
- ⁠Be seated by 0845hrs
- There is minimal parking available at the 4th SCDF Division. Alternatively, parking is available at ITE College West, where hourly parking rates will be imposed.

title: Anti ragging talk
body: Good morning. Following personnel are to attend the anti-ragging talk later. 830am, pride room.

title: Bearings check
body: Brush your hair, don’t look like a hobo.

title: Safety Briefing
body: Remember to brush your teeth. CFS said so.
